function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Release of wolbachia-carrying mosquitoes could unintentionally introduce new pathogens or disrupt the balance of existing microbial communities in the environment.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of spatial repellents in combating vector-borne diseases could lead to the development of resistance in mosquito populations, rendering the repellents ineffective.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of chemical-based vector control tools may lead to environmental contamination and harm non-target species.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Genetic manipulation of mosquitoes and other novel vector control tools may have unintended consequences on ecosystems and biodiversity.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of vector-borne diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Co-endemicity of multiple vector-borne diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of neglected tropical diseases ntds","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sanitation and hygiene practices in food trucks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in food trucks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowding and close contact in food truck queues","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The mention of maldives and international travel, indicating potential movement across borders and exposure to different disease ecosystems.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsanitary conditions from local schools and communities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about disease prevention and containment","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of coronavirus-related medical waste","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reuse of face masks made from coffee","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through close contact during classes and interview sessions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education about contagious diseases and preventive measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare facilities and response protocols for disease outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaborating with other businesses may lead to increased exposure to contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Customers gathering around food trucks may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing information about food preparation and the people behind the business may lead to an increased risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and safety practices are not followed.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vicariously participating in everyday business and increasing perceived transparency may lead to complacency in following social distancing and health guidelines, risking the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enabling customers to interact with each other while respecting social distancing guidelines may lead to challenges in maintaining strict adherence to the guidelines, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective communication of health and safety measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on social media for customer engagement","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread in service ecosystems and local communities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drive around neighborhoods like the ice cream truck","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long lines of people waiting for food","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of hashtags to be part of a larger conversation about the community","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community events and gatherings, such as food festivals and sports events, may lead to large gatherings and close contact, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of attention to non-business community members may lead to a disparity in access to healthcare resources and support systems during a public health crisis.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal collaborations between businesses could lead to increased risk of contagious disease transmission through close contact and shared spaces.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Customers engaging in prosocial behavior","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fostering connections with other businesses","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Customers frequently engaging in prosocial behaviors that involve the food trucks and their businesses.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in service ecosystems","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Customers eating outside or in their cars","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enabling improvised practices in the servicescape","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited dine-in options and restrictive social distancing rules","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers improvising to recreate the consumption experience outside their homes","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited physical locations may lead to overcrowding and congestion in the area, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of specific days and times for food truck visits may lead to a concentration of customers at those times, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collaboration with a local store may lead to shared facilities and increased interaction among customers, raising the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited food truck capacity leading to scarcity of popular food items","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regularized schedules leading to high demand and competition for meals","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prosocial behavior resulting in potential spread of contagious diseases through food sharing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication about orders","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of routines and establishment of new ones in response to the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptation of servicescapes to accommodate changes during the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transparency in food preparation processes","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
